text: i found something we can do with all that sand: <http://www.thisiscolossal.com/2015/08/3d-printed-glass/>

attachments.title: Watch Molten Glass 3D-Printed From a Kiln at 1900 Degrees
attachments.text: In collaboration with the MIT Glass Lab, theÂ Mediated Matter group at the MIT Media Lab has produced a way to 3D print glass, creating intricate patterns from molten glass inside a kiln-like printer and giving a completely modern twist to the 4,500 year-old material.
